Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.interfaces

Interface NoteService

All Known Implementing Classes:
NoteServiceImpl
@Service public interface NoteService
Service interface for handling operations related to notes.

  • Method Details

    • getNoteList

      List<Note> getNoteList()
      Retrieves a list of all notes.
      Returns:
      A list of Note representing all available notes.

    • getNoteById

      Note getNoteById(Long id)
      Retrieves a specific note by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the note to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Note representing the note with the specified ID.

    • createNote

      Note createNote(NoteRequestDto noteRequestDto)
      Creates a new note.
      Parameters:
      noteRequestDto - The DTO containing the details of the note to be created.
      Returns:
      A Note representing the newly created note.

    • updateNote

      Note updateNote(Long id, NoteRequestDto noteRequestDto)
      Updates an existing note.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the note to update.
      noteRequestDto - The DTO containing the updated details of the note.
      Returns:
      A Note representing the updated note.

    • deleteNoteById

      void deleteNoteById(Long id)
      Deletes a note by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the note to delete.
